title: Diana R. Nemergut Memorial Graduate Scholarship Fund
description: To provide support for non-traditional graduate students working on questions in the areas of environmental microbiology and ecological sustainability at the CU Boulder. If $25K is raised within five years, a pure endowment fund will be established.
marketingContent: To provide support for non-traditional graduate students working on questions in the areas of environmental microbiology and ecological sustainability at the CU Boulder. If $25K is raised within five years, a pure endowment fund will be established.
